txt.en: The final page of the ledger details the schedule of the chicken coop and the laying of their eggs. If they have not been destroyed, at least a good handful should be ready for the taking.
The ledger details out several items around the homestead and their values.
The chicken coops are by the main building of the homestead.\n\nThe final page of the ledger speaks of the chicken coops and the amount of eggs the homestead produces daily.
